title: Shadow BCI Emerges
outcome: With BCI failures mounting, Directorate techs attempt to trigger a slow system meltdown, hoping to regain control via ‘graceful degradation.’ Citizen groups discover this, and activists—alerted by Rada—rush to back up BCI data and create transparent, decentralized ‘shadow BCIs.’ These open, citizen-run scoring networks gradually replace the crumbling official system, causing power struggles, but offering a reckoning with the city’s past abuses.

events.description: Directorate technical staff initiate a BCI 'degradation protocol,' starting to intentionally wind down core processes under the guise of stability measures.
Rada uncovers evidence of impending BCI meltdown. Activists coordinate to back up critical data and distribute tools for local score transparency.
Shadow BCI networks appear across the city. Citizens, frustrated by the official system, migrate toward open, citizen-managed scoring for services.
Council factions and Directorate clash over shadow BCIs; public debates erupt, exposing the extent of past BCI abuse and shifting support to citizen-run systems.
